testcase.name: Contact Form - Rate Limiting › should allow up to 3 submissions within 15 minutes
Contact Form - Rate Limiting › should block 4th submission within 15 minutes
Contact Form - Security › should sanitize potential XSS in firstName
Contact Form - Security › should handle SQL injection attempts in message
Contact Form - Security › should validate phone number format if provided
Contact Form - Field Interactions › should preserve form data on validation error
Contact Form - Field Interactions › should handle very long messages
Contact Form - Field Interactions › should handle special characters in company name
Contact Form - Field Interactions › should handle international characters
Contact Form - Analytics Tracking › should track form interaction events
Contact Form - Accessibility › should have proper form labels
Contact Form - Accessibility › should be keyboard navigable
Contact Form - Accessibility › should announce errors to screen readers
Email Queue Processing - Authentication › should reject request without authorization header
Email Queue Processing - Authentication › should reject request with invalid Bearer token
Email Queue Processing - Authentication › should reject request with malformed authorization header
Email Queue Processing - Authentication › should accept request with valid Bearer token
Email Queue Processing - Authentication › should return 500 if CRON_SECRET environment variable not set
Email Queue Processing - Response Format › should return processing stats on success
Email Queue Processing - Response Format › should include processed and error counts in message
Email Queue Processing - Response Format › should return ISO timestamp
Email Queue Processing - GET Endpoint (Stats) › should get queue stats without authorization
Email Queue Processing - GET Endpoint (Stats) › should get queue stats with valid authorization
Email Queue Processing - GET Endpoint (Stats) › should return current timestamp in stats
Email Queue Processing - Security Headers › should apply security headers to response
Email Queue Processing - Security Headers › should return JSON content type
Email Queue Processing - Error Handling › should handle processing errors gracefully
Email Queue Processing - Error Handling › should return error details on failure
Email Queue Processing - Performance › should process queue within reasonable time
Email Queue Processing - Performance › should handle empty queue efficiently
Email Queue Processing - Idempotency › should be safe to call multiple times
Email Queue Processing - Integration › should process emails scheduled by contact form
Email Queue Processing - Integration › should process emails scheduled by lead magnet
Email Queue Processing - Monitoring › should provide queue statistics
Email Queue Processing - Monitoring › should track successful vs failed emails
Email Queue Processing - Edge Cases › should handle OPTIONS preflight request
Email Queue Processing - Edge Cases › should reject unsupported HTTP methods
Email Queue Processing - Edge Cases › should handle concurrent processing requests
Health Check - Basic Functionality › should respond to GET requests
Health Check - Basic Functionality › should respond to HEAD requests for uptime monitoring
Health Check - Basic Functionality › should respond quickly for fast health checks
Health Check - Response Format › should return JSON response
Health Check - Response Format › should include status in response
Health Check - Response Format › should include timestamp in response
Health Check - Response Format › should include uptime information
Health Check - Environment Validation › should validate critical environment variables
Health Check - Environment Validation › should indicate if required services are configured
Health Check - System Metrics › should include memory usage if available
Health Check - System Metrics › should include process information
Health Check - Service Availability › should check database connectivity if applicable
Health Check - Service Availability › should check email service status
Health Check - Service Availability › should check analytics service status
Health Check - Error Scenarios › should return 503 when unhealthy
